title: The Capture, episode 5 recap: we finally learnt how they did it
text:
This week, the six-part “post-truth” thriller surged towards it climax with flashbacks filling in the blanks. Here's what happened in the revelatory penultimate episode, titled A Pilgrim of Justice.

Shaun was shown the exonerating footage

We last left Lance Corporal Shaun Emery (Callum Turner) gatecrashing a secret meeting of anti-surveillance activists and being greeted by his solicitor Charlie (Barry Ward): “Shaun, I imagine you’d like to know what the f--- is going on.” Well, in an episode dominated by flashbacks, we finally got answers.
